bookAuthors: William Shakespeare, Barbara A. Mowat, Paul Werstine, Robert          Jackson, Gail Kern Paster
Plot: In Much Ado About Nothing, Shakespeare includes two quite different stories of romantic love. Hero and Claudio fall in love almost at first sight, but an outsider, Don John, strikes out at their happiness. Beatrice and Benedick are kept apart by pride and mutual antagonism until others decide to play Cupid.
Characters: boy, Hero (Much ado), Ursula (Shakespeare), Don Pedro, Beatrice (diverse works), Claudio, Don John, Leonato, Dogberry, Friar Francis, Verges, Magaret, Balthazar (Much Ado About Nothing), Borachio, Conrade, A Sexton, The Watch, Innogen, Antonio, Benedick Cratchit
